title: Pay Your Own Damn Loans! (Ep 1837)
description:
In this episode, I discuss new revelations about the FBI which could profoundly impact the Trump raid scandal. I also address Biden’s latest big government disaster. 

News Picks:


Some takeaways from last night’s elections.


Jim Jordan says more FBI whistleblowers coming forward: 'Every other week' 

Shocking new information about how a bureaucrat’s vendetta may have produced the Trump raid. 


Trump's Truth Social App Enjoys 550% Increase in Downloads Following FBI Raid of Mar-a-Lago.

There’s nothing better than libs advertising their stupidity on publicly platforms. 


Here’s how it might have looked if today’s ‘fact checkers’ had been able to censor speech throughout U.S. history.
